General.Name: Beijing Toread Outdoor Product
General.Description: Toread Holdings Group Co., Ltd. provides outdoor products in China. It offers children's outdoor equipment, waterproof hiking shoes, jackets, ski hats, windproof and water-repellent jackets, polar camp down jackets, outdoor running T-shirts, running and hiking pants, running and outdoor sports shoes, trousers, snowboard suits, windproof ski gloves, backpacks, moisture proof mats and tents, elastic socks, folding table and chair sets, canvas hammock, and hiking equipment. The company was formerly known as Beijing Toread Outdoor Products Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Toread Holdings Group Co., Ltd. in July 2015. Toread Holdings Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 28, Hongfu Pioneer Park, Beijing, China, 102209
